sentences.sContent: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.sCn: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.sContent: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.sCn: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.sContent: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.sCn: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.sContent: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.sCn: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.sContent: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.sCn: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.sContent: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.sCn: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.sContent: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.sCn: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.sContent: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.sCn: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

sentences.sContent: ...This is a mystery that many people have carefully thought about...
...we called white people by their trade, like characters in a mystery play...
...he has solved the mystery of language...
